species.name: tornadus
descriptions: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.
The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
This storm-stirring Pok√©mon is said to cause the seasons to turn by whipping up the air. I suspect its humanlike form to be a false one.
Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

abilities.name: prankster
abilities.effect: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.

abilities.name: defiant
abilities.effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.
